data.body:
Generated by orchestration session orch-1771056565972-1uqa0k.
Objective: Apply film metaphor branding, regroom orchestration, and update keyboard shortcuts helper to reflect all new bindings
Agent plan:
- 2 x frontend (svelte-ui)
Assigned beads:
- foolery-glj: replace ship with Take! and clapperboard icon
- foolery-s2x: introduce film metaphor
- foolery-pil: regroom orchestration
- foolery-j4z: update keyboard shortcuts helper
Notes: j4z depends on wave 1 hotkey changes being finalized. Agent-1 handles branding trio (glj, s2x, pil) which are thematically linked. Agent-2 handles j4z after wave 1 merges.
Assumptions:
- foolery-6qg (blocker for l8n) is resolved or nearly resolved since l8n is already in_progress
- Wave tags (i22) and wave tree (c47) changes don't conflict
- Film metaphor changes (glj, s2x, pil) can be implemented together without conflicting with hotkey work in wave 1
- Keyboard shortcuts helper (j4z) should be updated last to capture all binding changes from earlier waves
